title: Hah, so cute….
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>After that, Kanata-san, munch munch....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Hmm hmm, what about it? Take it easy~. Ah, you can eat this too~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Waah, sweet potatoes~!! Ruby loves this…. Munch<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Hmm hmm, so I’ve heard from Dia-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>What were we talking about again? Umm….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>It was about outfits right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ah, that’s right. Umm, so for the sequins of the next outfit, mixing and sprinkling random colors, or just sew them like an aurora from the beginning, which one do you think is better? Munch munch….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata thinks whatever Ruby-chan think is good will be the best. Because up until now, every single Aqours outfit has been wonderful. So whatever Ruby-chan and You-chan came up with, it will definitely fit Aqours perfectly. Ah, drink this tea too~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Waah, this tea has a really nice aroma~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>It’s Kanata-chan’s original blend~. I’ve also prepared some souvenirs♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
